overview:
Irena is a Principal at Highland focusing on investments in e-commerce, digital media and online business services with a particular emphasis on opportunities in Europe. Irena is actively involved with Highland’s investments in Autoquake, GlassesDirect and Photobox.

Background

Prior to joining Highland, Irena was a member of Googleâ€™s new business development team. Before Google, Irena worked at Index Ventures where she identified investment opportunities in consumer internet and emerging technology opportunities in Eastern Europe. Irena spent two years at Flybridge Capital Partners where she invested in and worked closely with several early-stage technology start ups. Irena has also worked as a strategy and private equity consultant at Bain & Company and at Tata Interactive Systems developing e-learning applications in Mumbai, India.
